sentence.Network_en: Peristalsis in the body of the esophagus is under vagal control.
sentence.Network_cn: 食管本体的蠕动受迷走神经支配.

sentence.Network_en: Adequate doses of atropine can abolish many types of reflex vagal cardiac slowing or asystole.
sentence.Network_cn: 适当剂量的阿托品能消除多种类型的迷走反射性心效减慢或停搏.

sentence.Network_en: While this is commonly agreed upon, the vagal innervation of idioventricular pacemakers is not.
sentence.Network_cn: 这点是人所公认的, 而心室自身起撑点的迷走神经支配还未得到公认.

list.abs: 另外迷走神经受箍缩导致迷走反射(Vagal reflex)，使心跳停止。由于气管受压造成肺部缺氧，最终导致受刑者窒息而丧失感觉。
